armor.name: Mistcloak
armor.description: Save +1 in mist zones of density medium or higher.

armor.name: Mist-Resistant Armor
armor.description: Reduces damage from mist anomalies by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

armor.name: Mistweave Plate
armor.description: wounds +2, Re-roll one failed Save roll once per Battle.

armor.name: Mistweave Shroud
armor.description: Wounds +1, Save +1 in mist zones. Re-roll one failed Save roll once per battle.

armor.name: Aegis Battleplate
armor.description: Wounds +5, Save +2, Movement -2″ (min 3) and cannot be used with Fly or Climb abilities.

armor.name: Mist-Tracker Goggles
armor.description: Goggles that highlight mist anomalies and hidden paths within 12".

armor.name: Stormweave Brigandine
armor.description: Wounds +3, Save +1 vs ranged attacks. Re-roll one failed Save per battle.

armor.name: Aetheric Pauldrons
armor.description: Wounds +2, reduces damage from psychic attacks by 1.

armor.name: Mistforged Cuirass
armor.description: Wounds +4, Save +1, Movement -1". Reduce damage from mist bourne attacks.

armor.name: Voidwalker Exosuit
armor.description: Wounds +8, Save 3+, Movement +2". Requires power cell (sold separately).

armor.name: Eclipse Shroud
armor.description: Wounds +2, Save +1. Once per battle: operative is in Cover for 1 turning point only in mist zones.

armor.name: Titanfall Plate
armor.description: Wounds +10, Save 3+, but Movement -3" and cannot Dash.

armor.name: Mistlord Raiment
armor.description: Wounds +5, Save +1. All mist-based healing effects are doubled for wearer (both target and performer).

consumables.name: Mist Compass
consumables.description: Handheld device, helps navigate mist zones. Roll 1D6; on a 4+, your character is not lost.

consumables.name: Stimpack
consumables.description: Single-use injector, restores 1D3 wounds to the user. Combat: 1AP, cannot be used within Control Range of enemy operatives.

consumables.name: Mist Grenade
consumables.description: A: 1 -- RNG: 6" -- WS: - -- DMG: -/- -- SR: Blast (3"), Mist Dispersal.

consumables.name: Mist Lantern
consumables.description: A portable light source that pierces through dense mist, illuminating a 6" radius.

consumables.name: Rations Pack
consumables.description: A week's worth of preserved food and water, essential for long journeys.

consumables.name: Medkit
consumables.description: Allows the user to stabilize wounded allies and restore 2D3 + 2 wounds. Combat: 1AP, cannot be used within Control Range of enemy operatives.

consumables.name: Mist-Repellent Spray
consumables.description: Single-use spray that clears mist in a 1" radius for 1 round. Combat: 1AP, cannot be used within Control Range of enemy operatives.

consumables.name: Signal Flare
consumables.description: A flare that can be used to signal for help or mark a location, visible through mist.

consumables.name: Medical Supplies
consumables.description: A basic kit containing bandages, antiseptics, and other first-aid materials. Consumed when using healing abilities.

consumables.name: Lockpick Set
consumables.description: A set of tools for bypassing locks and traps.

consumables.name: Stoutbarrel Ale
consumables.description: Restores 1D3 wounds but imposes a -1″ movement penalty for the next reposition action the operative performs.

consumables.name: Mist Maps
consumables.description: Grants re-rolls for navigation checks in mist zones.

consumables.name: Power Cell
consumables.description: Single-use energy core required to activate Voidwalker Exosuit for one mission. Provides 6 operational hours before depletion.

ammunition.name: Hellfire Rounds
ammunition.description: Rounds filled with acidic compounds, SR: Burning, Bleeding.

ammunition.name: Standard Plasma Cells
ammunition.description: Standard energy cells for plasma weapons.

ammunition.name: Standard Rounds
ammunition.description: Basic ammunition for gunpowder-based pistols and rifles.

ammunition.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
ammunition.description: Rounds designed to pierce armor, SR: Piercing 1.

ammunition.name: Hollow-Point Rounds
ammunition.description: Rounds that expand on impact, dealing +1 Damage to unarmored targets.

ammunition.name: Incendiary Rounds
ammunition.description: Rounds that ignite on impact, SR: Burning

ammunition.name: Fragmentation Rounds
ammunition.description: Rounds that explode on impact, SR: blast 1 inch.

deployables.name: Light Barricade
deployables.description: light barricade terrain, 2 inches x 1 inch, provides light cover.

deployables.name: Autogun Turret
deployables.description: Fixed in place, targets closest enemy.
